text: Ezɨ Godɨn damazim Judabar gumazir dapanibar garavɨra iti. Ezɨ Persian gavmanɨn gumazir dapanir pumuning gumaziba ingangarim damuan men anogoroghezir puvatɨgha, ghua Persian gumazir kaba ua Judaba amir bizir kamɨn gun mɨgɨa Darius bagh akɨnafarim osirigha, anemadagha mɨzua ghuav itima, an ikarvazimɨn akam ua ize.
